readingMnemonic: How will you make things <kanji>cool</kanji> and <kanji>cold</kanji>? You'll use a special <reading>ray</reading> (れい) gun that shoots a cold ray.
meaningMnemonic: You got your <radical>ice</radical> <radical>orders</radical>. Of course, your ice orders are to make things <kanji>cool</kanji> and <kanji>cold</kanji>.
